formalpara.title: Figure 2. The opposing roles of RHO-1 and MIG-2 Rac in hypdermal contraction during embryonic elongation
formalpara.para: Circumferential actin bundles in the hypodermis contract to drive embryonic elongation. RHO-1 stimulates hypodermal contraction via the LET-502 Rho-binding kinase, and MIG-2 Mtl Rac inhibits hypodermal contraction via MEL-11 myosin phosphatase in response to UNC-73 Trio Rac/Rho GEF.
